출시된지 10년이 넘었는데 압도적인 긍정적반응이 아직도 내려가지를 안는다.
포탈2는 그런게임이다. 몇년전에 아무것도 모르고 유툽동영상으로만 보던 포탈2를 직접 포탈건을 들면서 이곳저곳 돌아다니면서 막히는 부분이 있으면 공략보고 여러시도들을 해가면서 다양한 퍼즐요소들을 풀어나가는 재미가 있던 게임이었고 지금도 다시 생각나서 포탈2를 재설치 하고 있는 나를 보면 이게임은 명작중에 명작이란걸 알 수가 있다.
Portal 2 is an amazing game , i highly reccomend it to anyone who enjoys puzzle games  and witty A.I

i love this game. its one of my top 5 games ive ever played. i used to play it all the time on my Xbox but i since have switched to PC. i love the story, the characters, and the gameplay.

I think this is a very enjoyable game! It really gets my motor skills up and running, and helps me see things outside of the box!   Not only does this game help me with thinking inside of the game, but it helps me with everyday life experiences. I suggest this game to a lot of people, and I really think a bunch of people will see a difference in their perceptions!

I’ve just seen Portal 2 and nothing prepares you for this. I cheered, I shouted, I fist-pumped the air, I cried, I stood and cheered. It’s absolutely everything you hoped it was going to be.
Respect to the creators and whole team VALVe for such an amazing game! The game is addictive and worthy of attention from the community!

Одна из самых крутых игр, как по мне сильно недооцененная.

Portal 1 was influential, important, a massive part of both internet and general pop culture, and the basis of most modern puzzle design.

Portal 2 isn't any of those.

What it IS, though, is a sequel that's better in almost every conceivable way.
